heading: HR00005
0: RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS, AS THE LEAD AGENCY, THE NATIONAL ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY, THE PUBLIC-PRIVATE PARTNERSHIP CENTER, TO PRIORITIZE THE CONDUCT OF CONCEPTUAL ALIGNMENT STUDIES AND A PRE-FEASIBILITY STUDY OF AN ELEVATED OR UNDERGROUND ROADWAY SYSTEM IN CEBU CITY AND METRO CEBU TOWARDS ITS FINANCING AND IMPLEMENTATION

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00005
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS, AS THE LEAD AGENCY, THE NATIONAL ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY, THE PUBLIC-PRIVATE PARTNERSHIP CENTER, TO PRIORITIZE THE CONDUCT OF CONCEPTUAL ALIGNMENT STUDIES AND A PRE-FEASIBILITY STUDY OF AN ELEVATED OR UNDERGROUND ROADWAY SYSTEM IN CEBU CITY AND METRO CEBU TOWARDS ITS FINANCING AND IMPLEMENTATION
